1558270.name: Visual Novel Maker - Big Monster Sounds Vol 2
1558270.description:
Vol 2 of Big Monster Sounds is here! Bring your monsters to life with this great follow up to Vol 1. Containing monster sounds for Performing attacks (different intensities), Receiving attack sounds, Deaths, Growls, Shouts, Eating and more!

Features:

* 101 sound effects (+ 85 with an alternative version, slight echo added)
* Recorded by professional voice actors
* Intuitive file naming
* A version of 85 sounds on this pack it’s provided with echo (if you are going to use your own echo in-game, don’t choose this ones)
* All you’ll ever need regarding monster vocal sounds

[Format]

All files are in:
WAV – Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit
OGG – Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
